Get Tech Support







Main content start



 

 
Stanford students: We are here to assist you. Find the help you need:
Student Technical Support
	Technology support available to both undergrad and grad students in person and online
Tech Desk at The Hub
	Equipment checkout, how-to-guides, workshops and digital media equipment help
Public Printing Support
Public Computer Support
University and Off-Campus Support
Student Technical Support
Student Technical Support provides technical support to both undergraduate and graduate students. We are available online or in person at The Hub. 
Find out more about Peer Technology Specialists support 
For assistance or to schedule an appointment:
Submit a Help Request
Drop-in support is also available.
Tech Desk at Lathrop
The Tech Desk is your one stop for equipment checkout, how-to-guides, workshops, and digital media equipment help. 
Find out more and view Tech Desk hours
Call us:  1 (650) 723-9407Email: thetechdesk@stanford.edu
Public Printing Support
General: Submit a Help Request with questions or date, time, and description of the issue.
Printing Credit and Refunds: Email printingcredit@acomp.stanford.edu with details of the issue or refund request.
Public Computing Support
Cluster Software: Email techsys-staff@acomp.stanford.edu with problem reports, questions, or requests for new academic software.
University and Off-Campus Support
Contact HelpSU at helpsu.stanford.edu for technical assistance.
